verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <WH1732> Bless <WH1288> the LORD, <WH3068> O my soul: <WH5315> and all <WH3605> that is within <WH7130> me, bless his holy <WH6944> name. <WH8034>
Bless <WH1288> the LORD, <WH3068> O my soul, <WH5315> and forget <WH7911> not all <WH3605> his benefits: <WH1576>
Who forgives <WH5545> all <WH3605> your iniquities; <WH5771> who heals <WH7495> all <WH3605> your diseases; <WH8463>
Who redeems <WH1350> your life <WH2416> from destruction; <WH7845> who crowns <WH5849> you with loving kindness <WH2617> and tender mercies; <WH7356>
Who satisfies <WH7646> your mouth <WH5716> with good <WH2896> things; so that your youth <WH5271> is renewed <WH2318> like the eagle's. <WH5404>
The LORD <WH3068> executes <WH6213> righteousness <WH6666> and judgment <WH4941> for all <WH3605> that are oppressed. <WH6231>
He made known <WH3045> his ways <WH1870> to Moses, <WH4872> his acts <WH5949> to the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>
The LORD <WH3068> is merciful <WH7349> and gracious, <WH2587> slow <WH750> to anger, <WH639> and plenteous <WH7227> in mercy. <WH2617>
He will not always <WH5331> chide: <WH7378> neither <WH3808> will he keep <WH5201> his anger for ever. <WH5769>
He has not dealt <WH6213> with us after our sins; <WH2399> nor <WH3808> rewarded <WH1580> us according to our iniquities. <WH5771>
For as the heaven <WH8064> is high <WH1361> above <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> so great <WH1396> is his mercy <WH2617> toward <WH5921> them that fear <WH3373> him.
As far <WH7350> as the east <WH4217> is from the west, <WH4628> so far <WH7350> has he removed <WH7368> our transgressions <WH6588> from us.
Like as a father <WH1> pities <WH7355> his children, <WH1121> so the LORD <WH3068> pities <WH7355> them that fear <WH3373> him.
For he knows <WH3045> our frame; <WH3336> he remembers <WH2142> that we are dust. <WH6083>
As for man, <WH582> his days <WH3117> are as grass: <WH2682> as a flower <WH6731> of the field, <WH7704> so <WH3652> he flourishes. <WH6692>
For the wind <WH7307> passes <WH5674> over <WH5674> it, and it is gone; <WH369> and the place <WH4725> thereof shall know <WH5234> it no <WH3808> more. <WH5750>

But the mercy <WH2617> of the LORD <WH3068> is from everlasting <WH5769> to everlasting <WH5769> on them that fear <WH3373> him, and his righteousness <WH6666> to children's <WH1121> children; <WH1121>
To such as keep <WH8104> his covenant, <WH1285> and to those that remember <WH2142> his commandments <WH6490> to do <WH6213> them.
The LORD <WH3068> has prepared <WH3559> his throne <WH3678> in the heavens; <WH8064> and his kingdom <WH4438> rules <WH4910> over all. <WH3605>

Bless <WH1288> the LORD, <WH3068> you his angels, <WH4397> that excel <WH1368> in strength, <WH3581> that do <WH6213> his commandments, <WH1697> hearkening <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of his word. <WH1697>
Bless <WH1288> you the LORD, <WH3068> all <WH3605> you his hosts; <WH6635> you ministers <WH8334> of his, that do <WH6213> his pleasure. <WH7522>
Bless <WH1288> the LORD, <WH3068> all <WH3605> his works <WH4639> in all <WH3605> places <WH4725> of his dominion: <WH4475> bless <WH1288> the LORD, <WH3068> O my soul. <WH5315>
